quote: No matter what her father wanted, no way was Clara going to partner up with Light Walker. He'd suggested a tarantula for a snack, for heaven's sake.	The were never, ever, ever going to work together.
quote_letters: NO MATTER WHAT HER FATHER WANTED NO WAY WAS CLARA GOING TO PARTNER UP WITH LIGHT WALKER HED SUGGESTED A TARANTULA FOR A SNACK FOR HEAVENS SAKETHE WERE NEVER EVER EVER GOING TO WORK TOGETHER
